response.overview: TALES OF THE CURSED is a horror anthology - in the spirit of old school classics like CREEPSHOW, THE MONSTER CLUB and TALES FROM THE CRYPT - and is a love letter to horror anthologies, including homages to EVIL DEAD, H.P LOVECRAFT, RAY HARRYHAUSEN & many more.  Join your host, The Soul Collector, as he first brings you a tale of a man who finds nothing but tragedy, loneliness & zombies in TRAIL OF THE DEAD. Up next is THE DREADING, a giallo inspired story featuring witchcraft, ghosts & ritual murder. In our next tale, a warlock accidentally summons the wrong demon in THE SUMMONER. Finally a stranger must traverse a dangerous wasteland on a mission of two fisted revenge in the post apocalyptic kung fu western CHROME CITY 3000.
response.title: Tales of the Cursed
